name: Aketa
description:
Originally released: 8th December 2014.
Created for Ludum Dare 31.
Re-released for archival purposes - bugs are not intended to be fixed.

A platformer which takes place on one stage which consistently transforms as you traverse spike traps, lava pits and moving platforms in an attempt to find a way out.

CREDITS

Keiran Dawson: Art / Story
Cohen Dennis: Music / Sound Effects
Mathew Dwyer: Art / Level Design / Agony
Josef Frank: Music / Scripting

"Aketa's Theme" available for download on Bandcamp.
